title: How it feels to play as Bard in one-for-all

replies.body:
My thoughts when my teammates pick him
http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m3bk50Knw31r3ovdbo1_500.gif
I've learned that it's not a matter of him being a bad pick, rather that too many people don't understand he's a tanky AP champ and try to build things like attack speed on him.

Abyssal is for scrubs. The deathcap is where it's at.

ALL HAIL DEATHCAP

I personally love {{item:3116}}.

It tacks a 40% slow onto your meeps, which already slow, and gives you an assload of damage.

If I am nearing 65 chimes, I build that even on regular support bard.

> [{quoted}](name=The True Bard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WMB89vfR,comment-id=00010000000000000001,timestamp=2015-10-21T06:31:18.634+0000)
>
> I personally love {{item:3116}}.
> 
> It tacks a 40% slow onto your meeps, which already slow, and gives you an assload of damage.

Slows don't stack, so it doesn't really add much.
It'll add another half second of 40% slow

stronger effect takes over for full duration, if that is short the second slow duration takes over for the rest
i believe
Instead, get a Liandry's Torment
Don't forget the trinket {{item:3089}}
Pssh who builds abyssal?
Trade frozen for statik shiv for the extra burst damage with meeps.
My god, that damage is almost over 9000 TONS of damage

CHIMES FOR DAYS, SON! Chimes for dayyyyys. 

I love playing the trolly champions like Tahm Kench or Bard in All for One. :3
Except Tahm is actually very strong when played well. Bard seemed like it too due to perma stun but the Jayce game was too strong.

> [{quoted}](name=LtSmashFSP,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WMB89vfR,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2015-10-21T17:31:41.506+0000)
>
> Except Tahm is actually very strong when played well. Bard seemed like it too due to perma stun but the Jayce game was too strong.

When I'm picking All for Ones, I definitely pick for fun-ness as opposed to strength. I just wanna do fun things like a Tahm relay race or a Bard soul train ride. Makes for a nice break from picking to win in Ranked.
ever tried {{champion:6}} ? He's a pretty fun pick.
But Tahm is a great win pick because after one eats you someone eats the other one and it is a great chain of you getting 1000 units from your team in utter darkness.

Who do you hate fighting in One for All?

For me, it's bloody Yasuo.

Land 1 knockup on like 2 guys and they're both instantly dead

Jayce game was too strong.

O! how we crashed the Jayces last night! they ware ahead 31 kills, at one point even 45 maybe. But they just couldn't take down 6 dragons. 

http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1268527912/204504166?tab=overview
Wow, I am amazed they didn't just close it out but props to you
My favorite All-for-one game was Bard vs Nidalee. There were spears flying everywhere, and we were dodging them by making portals through everything. Good times.
Have you yet tried Zac in All for One? It sounds, looks, and feels hilarious.

I played a game of Bard vs Taric.  While it was truly outrageous, the ridiculousness of the team being able to say no to fights for about 10 seconds until we all arrived was hilarious.  That and the endless Q stuns.

i played bard vs kindred...we were able to get a few kills early game, later we all just started collecting chimes, i had around 60 chimes.... 
I regert nOtihmg
only 60? Noob.
You're only a true bard player if break 100

But what when my team decides we need to "End the game" before I can get there? Something about our Jinx "having 5 kills from lane," and "knocking down towers in 5 seconds" apparently made them end my chime hunt.
You're playing bard, it's not hard to stop them
I was wondering where Laughing fish went since his upvote spectacular. He's going on a rampage right now lmao.
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/06/Hulk-smile-gif.gif?gs=a
RIP gif
Hooray for 10 second {{item:3157}}
Have you tried Kalista? the quintuple ult is the greatest thing ever.
Oh yeah I remember this post.. Holy shit its been 2 years!?
My team of Bards beat a team of Azirs. It was glorious
If you cross multiple magical journeys together, would you create a dimensional time rift where all bards would over lap?
Any sort of tanky ap items + lich bane with 70+ meeps = instant gg
No. Not at all.

Played all bards vs Jinx.
We lost terribly, but it was honestly the most fun I've had in over a week

So.

MANY.

#CHIMES.
I laughed so fucking hard at this...
i played against 5x reksai, we had 5x malzahar so we Trexed em under tower but all they did was burrow around the tower 24/7 lewl.

Actually had a 5 Bard vs 5 Syndra game yesterday.

We kinda stomped team fights rather hard. Mostly because they just couldn't properly set up their spheres for the one shot ults. We were all going AP and 3 shot them with meep auto attacks and Qs.
Ive been going devourer jungle Bard and having been deleting people.
Bard jungle is really fun.
